register.description: CORE module clock selection.

bitfield.description: Selects L4 interconnect clock (L4_clk)

bitenum.description: L4_CLK is L3_CLK divided by 1
L4_CLK is L3_CLK divided by 2, to be used for OPP100 and OPP50

bitfield.description: Selects L3 interconnect clock (L3_clk)

bitenum.description: L3_CLK is CORE_CLK divided by 1
L3_CLK is CORE_CLK divided by 2, to be used for OPP100 and OPP50

bitfield.description: Selects CORE_CLK configuration

bitenum.description: CORE_CLK is CORE_X2_CLK divided by 1, to be used for OPP100 and OPP50
CORE_CLK is CORE_X2_CLK divided by 2

register.description: ABE module clock selection.

bitfield.description: Gating control for SLIMBUS_CLK clock tree in ABE. SLIMbus module always gets the ungated version.

bitenum.description: The clock is gated
The clock is enabled

bitfield.description: Gating control for PAD_CLKS clock tree in ABE

bitenum.description: The clock is gated
The clock is enabled

bitfield.description: Selects the OPP divider ABE domain

bitenum.description: ABE_CLK is divide by 1 of DPLL_ABE_X2_CLK, to be used for OPP100
ABE_CLK is divide by 2 of DPLL_ABE_X2_CLK, to be used for OPP50
ABE_CLK is divide by 4 of DPLL_ABE_X2_CLK

register.description: Special register for DLL control

bitfield.description: Control if DLL lock and code outputs are overriden or not

bitenum.description: Lock and code outputs are not overriden
Lock output is overriden to 1 and code output is overriden with a value coming from control module.

register.description: This register allows controlling the DPLL modes.

bitfield.description: Control if only low frequency spread is required

bitenum.description: When SSC is enabled, clock frequency is spread on both sides of the programmed frequency
When SSC is enabled, clock frequency is spread only on the lower side of the programmed frequency

bitfield.description: Acknowledgement from the DPLL regarding start and stop of Spread Spectrum Clocking feature

bitenum.description: SSC has been turned off on PLL o/ps
SSC has been turned on on PLL o/ps

bitfield.description: Enable or disable Spread Spectrum Clocking

bitenum.description: SSC disabled
SSC enabled

bitfield.description: Enable the REGM4XEN mode of the DPLL. Please check the DPLL documentation to check when this mode can be enabled.

bitenum.description: REGM4XEN mode of the DPLL is disabled

bitfield.description: Set the DPLL in low-power mode. Check the DPLL documentation to see when this can be enabled.

bitenum.description: Low-power mode of the DPLL is disabled
Low-power mode of the DPLL is enabled

bitfield.description: This bit allows to enable or disable the automatic recalibration feature of the DPLL. The DPLL will automatically start a recalibration process upon assertion of the DPLL's RECAL flag if this bit is set.

bitenum.description: DRIFTGUARD feature is disabled
DRIFTGUARD feature is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL control. Upon Warm Reset, the PRCM DPLL control state machine updates this register to reflect MN bypass mode.

bitenum.description: Put the DPLL in MN bypass mode. The DPLL_MULT register bits are reset to 0 automatically by putting the DPLL in this mode.
Put the DPLL in Idle bypass low-power mode.
Put the DPLL in Idle bypass fast-relock mode.
Enables the DPLL in lock mode

register.description: This register allows monitoring DPLL activity. This register is read only and automatically updated. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: DPLL MN_BYPASS status

bitenum.description: DPLL is in MN_Bypass
DPLL is not in MN_Bypass

bitfield.description: DPLL lock status

bitenum.description: DPLL is LOCKED
DPLL is either in bypass mode or in stop mode.

register.description: This register provides automatic control over the DPLL activity.

bitfield.description: DPLL automatic control.

bitenum.description: DPLL auto control disabled
The DPLL is automatically put in low-power stop mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.
The DPLL is automatically put in fast-relock stop mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.
The DPLL is automatically put in idle bypass low-power mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.
The DPLL is automatically put in idle bypass fast-relock mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.

register.description: This register provides controls over the DPLL.

bitfield.description: Allows control of the BYPASS clock of the PLL and the associated HSDIVIDER. Same as ULOWCLKEN on DPLL. In DPLL locked mode, 0 - No impact 1 - No impact In DPLL bypass mode, 0 - CLKINP is selected as the BYPASS clock for CLKOUT/CLKOUTX2 1 - CLKINPULOW is selected as the BYPASS clock for CLKOUT/CLKOUTX2
Selects the source of the DPLL CLKOUTHIF clock. Same as CLKINPHIFSEL pin on the DPLL

bitenum.description: CLKOUTHIF is generated from the DPLL oscillator (DCO)
CLKOUTHIF is generated from CLKINPHIF

bitfield.description: DPLL multiplier factor (2 to 2047). This register is automatically cleared to 0 when the DPLL_EN field in the *CLKMODE_DPLL* register is set to select MN bypass mode. (equal to input M of DPLL; M=2 to 2047 = DPLL multiplies by M).
DPLL divider factor (0 to 127) (equal to input N of DPLL; actual division factor is N+1).

register.description: This register provides controls over the M2 divider of the DPLL.

bitfield.description: DPLL CLKOUT status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: Control gating of DPLL CLKOUT

bitenum.description: Automatically gate this clock when there is no dependency for it
Force this clock to stay enabled even if there is no request

bitfield.description: Toggle on this status bit after changing DPLL_CLKOUT_DIV indicates that the change in divider value has taken effect
DPLL post-divider factor, M2, for internal clock generation (1 to 31); Divide value from 1 to 31.

bitenum.description: 1, to be used for OPP100
2, to be used for OPP50

register.description: This register provides controls over the M3 divider of the DPLL.

bitfield.description: DPLL CLKOUTHIF status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: Control gating of DPLL CLKOUTHIF

bitenum.description: Gate unconditionally this clock and stop requesting it
Request this clock and un-gate it when available

bitfield.description: Toggle on this status bit after changing DPLL_CLKOUTHIF_DIV indicates that the change in divider value has taken effect
DPLL post-divider factor, M3, for internal clock generation (1 to 31). Divide value from 1 to 31

bitenum.description: 5, to be used for OPP100
8, to be used for OPP50

register.description: This register provides controls over the CLKOUT1 o/p of the HSDIVIDER.

bitfield.description: Direct power down control for HSDIVIDER M4 divider and CLKOUT1 output. Power down should be enabled only when clock is first gated.

bitenum.description: Divider is powered up
Divider is powered down

bitfield.description: HSDIVIDER CLKOUT1 status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: Control gating of HSDIVIDER CLKOUT1

bitenum.description: Automatically gate this clock when there is no dependency for it
Force this clock to stay enabled even if there is no request

bitfield.description: Toggle on this status bit after changing HSDIVIDER_CLKOUT1_DIV indicates that the change in divider value has taken effect
DPLL M4 post-divider factor (1 to 31).

bitenum.description: 8, to be used for OPP100 and OPP50

register.description: This register provides controls over the CLKOUT2 o/p of the HSDIVIDER.

bitfield.description: Direct power down control for HSDIVIDER M5 divider and CLKOUT2 output. Power down should be enabled only when clock is first gated.

bitenum.description: Divider is powered up
Divider is powered down

bitfield.description: HSDIVIDER CLKOUT2 status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: Control gating of HSDIVIDER CLKOUT2

bitenum.description: Automatically gate this clock when there is no dependency for it
Force this clock to stay enabled even if there is no request

bitfield.description: Toggle on this status bit after changing HSDIVIDER_CLKOUT2_DIV indicates that the change in divider value has taken effect
DPLL M5 post-divider factor (1 to 31)

bitenum.description: 4, to be used for OPP100
8, to be used for OPP50

register.description: This register provides controls over the CLKOUT3 o/p of the HSDIVIDER.

bitfield.description: Direct power down control for HSDIVIDER M6 divider and CLKOUT3 output. Power down should be enabled only when clock is first gated.

bitenum.description: Divider is powered up
Divider is powered down

bitfield.description: HSDIVIDER CLKOUT3 status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: Control gating of HSDIVIDER CLKOUT3

bitenum.description: Automatically gate this clock when there is no dependency for it
Force this clock to stay enabled even if there is no request

bitfield.description: Toggle on this status bit after changing HSDIVIDER_CLKOUT3_DIV indicates that the change in divider value has taken effect
DPLL M6 post-divider factor (1 to 31)

bitenum.description: 6, to be used for OPP100
8, to be used for OPP50

register.description: This register provides controls over the CLKOUT4 o/p of the HSDIVIDER.

bitfield.description: Direct power down control for HSDIVIDER M7 divider and CLKOUT4 output. Power down should be enabled only when clock is first gated.

bitenum.description: Divider is powered up
Divider is powered down

bitfield.description: HSDIVIDER CLKOUT4 status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: Control gating of HSDIVIDER CLKOUT4

bitenum.description: Automatically gate this clock when there is no dependency for it
Force this clock to stay enabled even if there is no request

bitfield.description: Toggle on this status bit after changing HSDIVIDER_CLKOUT4_DIV indicates that the change in divider value has taken effect
DPLL M7 post-divider factor (1 to 31)

bitenum.description: 6, to be used for OPP100 for 266.7-MHz clock output
8, to be used for OPP100 for 200-MHz clock output
12, to be used for OPP50 for 133.3-MHz clock output
16, to be used for OPP50 for 100-MHz clock output

register.description: Control the DeltaMStep parameter for Spread Spectrum Clocking. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: DeltaMStep is split into fractional and integer part. For Triangular Spread Spectrum: [19:18] for integer part, [17:0] for fractional part For Square Wave Spread Spectrum [19:14] for integer part, [13:0] for fractional part

register.description: Control the Modulation Frequency (Fm) for Spread Spectrum. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Set the Exponent component of MODFREQDIV factor
Set the Mantissa component of MODFREQDIV factor

register.description: This register provides emulation override controls over the CORE DPLL.

bitfield.description: This bit allows to enable or disable the emulation override controls

bitenum.description: The emulation override controls are disabled
The emulation override controls are enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL multiplier factor (2 to 2047). (equal to input M of DPLL; M=2 to 2047 = DPLL multiplies by M)
CORE DPLL override divider factor (0 to 127) (equal to input N of DPLL; actual division factor is N+1).

register.description: This register allows controlling the DPLL modes.

bitfield.description: Control if only low frequency spread is required

bitenum.description: When SSC is enabled, clock frequency is spread on both sides of the programmed frequency
When SSC is enabled, clock frequency is spread only on the lower side of the programmed frequency

bitfield.description: Acknowledgement from the DPLL regarding start and stop of Spread Spectrum Clocking feature

bitenum.description: SSC has been turned off on PLL o/ps
SSC has been turned on on PLL o/ps

bitfield.description: Enable or disable Spread Spectrum Clocking

bitenum.description: SSC disabled
SSC enabled

bitfield.description: Enable the REGM4XEN mode of the DPLL. Please check the DPLL documentation to check when this mode can be enabled.

bitenum.description: REGM4XEN mode of the DPLL is disabled

bitfield.description: Set the DPLL in low-power mode. Check the DPLL documentation to see when this can be enabled.

bitenum.description: Low-power mode of the DPLL is disabled
Low-power mode of the DPLL is enabled

bitfield.description: This bit allows to enable or disable the automatic recalibration feature of the DPLL. The DPLL will automatically start a recalibration process upon assertion of the DPLL's RECAL flag if this bit is set.

bitenum.description: DRIFTGUARD feature is disabled
DRIFTGUARD feature is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL control. Upon Warm Reset, the PRCM DPLL control state machine updates this register to reflect MN bypass mode.

bitenum.description: Put the DPLL in MN bypass mode. The DPLL_MULT register bits are reset to 0 automatically by putting the DPLL in this mode.
Put the DPLL in idle bypass low-power mode.
Put the DPLL in idle bypass fast-relock mode.
Enables the DPLL in lock mode

register.description: This register allows monitoring DPLL activity. This register is read only and automatically updated. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: DPLL MN_BYPASS status

bitenum.description: DPLL is in MN_Bypass
DPLL is not in MN_Bypass

bitfield.description: DPLL lock status

bitenum.description: DPLL is LOCKED
DPLL is either in bypass mode or in stop mode.

register.description: This register provides automatic control over the DPLL activity.

bitfield.description: DPLL automatic control;

bitenum.description: DPLL auto control disabled
The DPLL is automatically put in low-power stop mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.
The DPLL is automatically put in fast-relock stop mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.
The DPLL is automatically put in idle bypass low-power mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.
The DPLL is automatically put in idle bypass fast-relock mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.

register.description: This register provides controls over the DPLL.

bitfield.description: The value 'NbCycles' set in this field determines the duration of the clock ramp step during which the output frequency is Fdpll/(2*M2). The duration is computed as 32 x NbCycles of L4 clock cycles (100 MHz). Duration should be 2.5 µs to allow enough time for DCC to lock. This bit field is relevant only when DCC_EN = 1.
Only CLKINPULOW bypass clock supported for this PLL

Enable or disable duty cycle correction. Must be enabled only for frequency 1 GHz.When enabled, the CLKOUTHIF output of the DPLL is used after duty cycle correction instead of CLKOUT. The M3 divider is hard-wired to 1 so the lock frequency Fdpll is directly provided to MPU. .

bitenum.description: DCC disabled
DCC enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL multiplier factor (2 to 2047). This register is automatically cleared to 0 when the DPLL_EN field in the *CLKMODE_DPLL* register is set to select MN bypass mode. (equal to input M of DPLL; M=2 to 2047 = DPLL multiplies by M).
DPLL divider factor (0 to 127) (equal to input N of DPLL; actual division factor is N+1).

register.description: This register provides controls over the M2 divider of the DPLL.

bitfield.description: DPLL CLKOUT status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: Control gating of DPLL CLKOUT

bitenum.description: Automatically gate this clock when there is no dependency for it
Force this clock to stay enabled even if there is no request

bitfield.description: Toggle on this status bit after changing DPLL_CLKOUT_DIV indicates that the change in divider value has taken effect
DPLL post-divider factor, M2, for internal clock generation (1 to 31);Divide value from 1 to 31

bitenum.description: 1, to be used for OPP100, OPP_TURBO, OPP_NITRO, and OPP_NITROSB
2, to be used for OPP50

register.description: Control the DeltaMStep parameter for Spread Spectrum Clocking. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: DeltaMStep is split into fractional and integer part. For Triangular Spread Spectrum: [19:18] for integer part, [17:0] for fractional part For Square Wave Spread Spectrum [19:14] for integer part, [13:0] for fractional part

register.description: Control the Modulation Frequency (Fm) for Spread Spectrum. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Set the Exponent component of MODFREQDIV factor
Set the Mantissa component of MODFREQDIV factor

register.description: Control MPU PLL BYPASS clock. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Select the DPLL MPU bypass clock

bitenum.description: DPLL_MPU bypass clock is CORE_X2_CLK divided by 1, to be used for OPP100 and OPP50
DPLL_MPU bypass clock is CORE_X2_CLK divided by 2
DPLL_MPU bypass clock is CORE_X2_CLK divided by 4
DPLL_MPU bypass clock is CORE_X2_CLK divided by 8

bitfield.description: Control if only low frequency spread is required

bitenum.description: When SSC is enabled, clock frequency is spread on both sides of the programmed frequency

bitenum.description: SSC has been turned off on PLL o/ps
SSC has been turned on on PLL o/ps

bitfield.description: Enable or disable Spread Spectrum Clocking

bitenum.description: SSC disabled
SSC enabled

bitenum.description: Low-power mode of the DPLL is disabled
Low-power mode of the DPLL is enabled

bitenum.description: DRIFTGUARD feature is disabled
DRIFTGUARD feature is enabled

Put the DPLL in idle bypass low-power mode.

bitenum.description: DPLL is in MN_Bypass
DPLL is not in MN_Bypass

bitfield.description: DPLL lock status

register.description: This register provides automatic control over the DPLL activity.

bitfield.description: DPLL automatic control;

bitenum.description: DPLL auto control disabled
The DPLL is automatically put in low-power stop mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.
The DPLL is automatically put in fast-relock stop mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.

register.description: This register provides controls over the DPLL.

bitfield.description: Allows control of the BYPASS clock of the PLL and the associated HSDIVIDER. Same as ULOWCLKEN on DPLL. In DPLL locked mode, 0 - No impact 1 - No impact In DPLL bypass mode, 0 - CLKINP is selected as the BYPASS clock for CLKOUT/CLKOUTX2 1 - CLKINPULOW is selected as the BYPASS clock for CLKOUT/CLKOUTX2

DPLL multiplier factor (2 to 2047). This register is automatically cleared to 0 when the DPLL_EN field in the *CLKMODE_DPLL* register is set to select MN bypass mode. (equal to input M of DPLL; M=2 to 2047 = DPLL multiplies by M).
DPLL divider factor (0 to 127) (equal to input N of DPLL; actual division factor is N+1).

register.description: This register provides controls over the CLKOUT1 o/p of the HSDIVIDER.

bitfield.description: Direct power down control for HSDIVIDER M4 divider and CLKOUT1 output. Power down should be enabled only when clock is first gated.

bitenum.description: Divider is powered up
Divider is powered down

bitfield.description: HSDIVIDER CLKOUT1 status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: Control gating of HSDIVIDER CLKOUT1

bitenum.description: Automatically gate this clock when there is no dependency for it
Force this clock to stay enabled even if there is no request

bitfield.description: Toggle on this status bit after changing HSDIVIDER_CLKOUT1_DIV indicates that the change in divider value has taken effect
DPLL M4 post-divider factor (1 to 31)

bitenum.description: 2, to be used for OPP_TURBO and OPP_NITRO
4, to be used for OPP100
8, to be used for OPP50

register.description: This register provides controls over the CLKOUT2 o/p of the HSDIVIDER.

bitfield.description: Direct power down control for HSDIVIDER M5 divider and CLKOUT2 output. Power down should be enabled only when clock is first gated.

bitenum.description: Divider is powered up

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitenum.description: Automatically gate this clock when there is no dependency for it

DPLL M5 post-divider factor (1 to 31)

bitenum.description: 2, to be used for OPP_NITRO
3, to be used for OPP_TURBO
7, to be used for OPP100
14, to be used for OPP50

register.description: Shadow register to program new DPLL configuration affecting EMIF and GPMC (L3 clock) functional frequency during DVFS. The PRCM h/w automatically applies the new configuration after EMIF/GPMC have been put in idle state.

bitfield.description: Shadow register forCM_DIV_M2_DPLL_CORE.DPLL_CLKOUT_DIV. The main register is automatically loaded with the shadow register value after EMIF IDLE if the FREQ_UPDATE field is set to 1. Divide value from 1 to 31.
Shadow register forCM_CLKMODE_DPLL_CORE.DPLL_EN. The main register is automatically loaded with the shadow register value after EMIF IDLE if the FREQ_UPDATE field is set to 1.

bitenum.description: Put the DPLL in MN bypass mode. The DPLL_MULT register bits are reset to 0 automatically by putting the DPLL in this mode.
Put the DPLL in idle bypass low-power mode.
Put the DPLL in idle bypass fast-relock mode.
Enables the DPLL in lock mode

bitfield.description: Specify if DLL should be reset or not during the frequency change hardware sequence.

bitenum.description: DLL is not reset during the frequency change hardware sequence
DLL is reset automatically during the frequency change hardware sequence

bitfield.description: Shadow register forCM_DLL_CTRL.DLL_OVERRIDE.The main register is automatically loaded with the shadow register value after EMIF IDLE if the FREQ_UPDATE field is set to 1.

bitenum.description: Lock and code outputs are not overriden
Lock output is overriden to 1 and code output is overriden with a value coming from control module.

bitfield.description: Writing 1 indicates that a new configuration is available. It is automatically cleared by h/w after the configuration has been applied.

register.description: Shadow register to program new DPLL configuration affecting GPMC (L3 clock) functional frequency during DVFS. The PRCM h/w automatically applies the new configuration after EMIF/GPMC have been put in idle state.

bitfield.description: Shadow register forCM_DIV_M5_DPLL_CORE.HSDIVIDER_CLKOUT2_DIV. The main register is automatically loaded with the shadow register value after GPMC IDLE if the CM_SHADOW_FREQ_CONFIG1.FREQ_UPDATE field is set to 1 and GPMC_FREQ_UPDATE is set to 1. Divide value from 1 to 31.

Shadow register forCM_CLKSEL_CORE.CLKSEL_L3. The main register is automatically loaded with the shadow register value after GPMC IDLE if the CM_SHADOW_FREQ_CONFIG1.FREQ_UPDATE field is set to 1 and GPMC_FREQ_UPDATE is set to 1.

bitenum.description: L3_CLK is CORE_CLK divided by 1
L3_CLK is CORE_CLK divided by 2

bitfield.description: Shadow register forCM_CLKSEL_CORE.CLKSEL_CORE. The main register is automatically loaded with the shadow register value after GPMC IDLE if the CM_SHADOW_FREQ_CONFIG1.FREQ_UPDATE field is set to 1 and GPMC_FREQ_UPDATE is set to 1.

bitenum.description: CORE_CLK is CORE_X2_CLK divided by 1
CORE_CLK is CORE_X2_CLK divided by 2

bitfield.description: Controls whether or not GPMC has to be put automatically into idle during the frequency change operation.

bitenum.description: GPMC is not put automatically into idle during frequency change operation.
GPMC is put automatically into idle during frequency change operation.

register.description: Control the time unit of the sliding window for dynamic dependencies (auto-sleep feature).

bitfield.description: Time unit is equal to (PRESCAL + 1) L4 clock cycles.

register.description: Automatic restore status. This register is used by the system DMA to write a predefined value at the end of end automatic restore phase. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Indicates if restore phase 2b is completed. Must be cleared by software before going to device OFF mode.
Indicates if restore phase 2a is completed. Must be cleared by software before going to device OFF mode.
Indicates if restore phase 1 is completed. Must be cleared by software before going to device OFF mode.
